tool.name: Symmetrize
tool.help:
Description::
Symmetrization of the dinucleotide profiles enhances patterns with respect to a dyad position of a nucleosome. To symmetrize dinucleotide's positional frequency pattern with respect to a dyad position, a frequency patterns of dinucleotides on forward and complementary sequences are superimposed by averaging forward and reversed complement profiles of identified nucleosome. A base pair number indicating upstream (-) and downstream (+) position with respect to a dyad is given on a firts column.
Example::
Input tabular:
pos AA.f AC.f AG.f AT.f CA.f CC.f CG.f CT.f ... 20 0.100200 0.084720 0.077200 0.072480 0.066160 0.044160 0.004560 0.060720 21 0.172440 0.024800 0.002080 0.101240 0.131840 0.007200 0.000320 0.095920 22 0.077160 0.096240 0.314320 0.047360 0.012040 0.028560 0.011840 0.013680 ...
Output tabular:
pos AA AC AG AT ... -73 0.08616 0.08034 0.07146 0.05934 ... -72 0.11976 0.04966 0.03412 0.07274 ... -71 0.07202 0.08882 0.18912 0.0462 ... ...
